name: Back to the Past
description:
Back to the Past is a game made in 2 days for the GDU Game Jam #1

Back to the Past is a third person walking simulator. The story takes place in the near future, where the environment has been ruined due to the destruction from the wars. The player must find a way to go back to what was lost!!!

Controls:

WASD: Move

'E' - Pick up
